name: Ghost Friend
description:
Entry for the 2021 GMTK game jam.

A short top-down puzzle game about helping your friend overcome their fear of being alone.  

Thanks to my friends who helped play test my game.

Made in Gamemaker Studio 2

Art made in Aesprite

Free assets I used:

m5x7 font by Danial Linssen

music on pixabay.com

unlocking and digging  sound effect on freesound.org

other sound effects on epidemicsound.com
